title: Tom yum soup with vegetables
ingredients: ['2.5 litres chicken stock', '12 thin slices galangal', '6 kaffir lime leaves', '3 stalks lemon grass, smashed and cut into 2.5cm pieces', '3 tablespoons hot chilli paste', '90ml fish sauce', '250ml lime juice', '6 shallots, thinly sliced', '3 plum tomatoes, chopped', '75g sliced button mushrooms', '100g finely chopped pak choi', '125g thinly sliced carrot', '6 sprigs fresh coriander, for garnish', '6 spring onions, thinly sliced']
